channel.title: project on Huy Le
channel.description: Recent content in project on Huy Le

item.title: Scratchpad for Home Automation
item.description: Initial setup hassio running on VM esphome installed Network info iw dev - will show you all the wireless interface names Flashing using Tuya Convert pulled image and build as Tuya-convert instructions after pull did docker-compose exec tuya bash will enable interaction to the container run it the container and see the screen do screen -ls to see all the screen running do screen -r to attach to the screen to see the info all of this is sitting in the base /usr/bin/tuya-convert/script/*.

item.title: Shower Pan
item.description: Shower Pan Construction Material Needed Shower rough valve Framing and Plumbing Shower Pan Shower pan use packed dry mud on bottom layer 5 to 1 mixture of sand and Portland cement clay like mixture that hold its shape when packed Top mortar layer should be 1 1/2” - 2” thick at the drain Notes about different layers of mortars Thin is a recipe for failure.

item.title: ESP MCU
item.description: A location for all my ESP8266 projects.
